sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.canDeleteServiceCategory</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>canDeleteServiceCategory</name>
        <script><![CDATA[function canDeleteServiceCategory(category) {
	if (category.category.nil())
		return true;
	
	var m2m = new GlideRecord("sc_cat_item_category");
	m2m.addQuery("sc_category", category.category);
	m2m.query();
	if (m2m.hasNext())
		return false; // cannot delete a Service Category that has Published Services
		
	var stagedServices = new GlideRecord("sc_ic_item_staging");
	stagedServices.addQuery("sc_categories", "CONTAINS", category.category);
	stagedServices.query();
	if (stagedServices.hasNext())
		return false; // cannot delete a Service Category that has Draft Services
	
	return true;
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2014-09-22 15:54:15</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>35da8bb1d7532100a9ad1e173e24d4c6</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>canDeleteServiceCategory</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Service Creator" source="com.glide.service_creator">bbb141436d6620100acb70b3534330b7</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_35da8bb1d7532100a9ad1e173e24d4c6</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2014-09-22 16:55:50</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>595</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
